caption: Figure 2: Relations between selected contexts and similarity.
description: The chart shows the relationship between the number of top-k reports selected and their similarity scores, as well as the validation and test accuracy.

caption: Figure 3: Alignment analysis with and without RAG. OR: Over-Reliance; CR: Copy-Reference.
description: The chart displays the rates of over-reliance and copy-reference errors before and after incorporating the proposed MMed-RAG system.

caption: Figure 3: Alignment analysis with and without RAG. OR: Over-Reliance; CR: Copy-Reference.
description: The chart displays a comparison of the original Med-LVLM and MMed-RAG in terms of Copy-Reference (CR) rate and Over-Reliance (OR) rate, showcasing the effectiveness of MMed-RAG in mitigating misalignment issues.
